title: Hospital Sign In, First Operation Shocked the Nation

synopsis: First day check-in, reward 【World-Class Cardiac Surgery Experience】/n/nSecond day check-in, reward 【World-Class Neurosurgery Experience】/n/nThird day check-in, reward 【World-Class Carotid Surgery Experience】/n/n....../n/nThree months after Qin Feng started his internship at the hospital, his originally peaceful life was disrupted./n/nWhen everyone was at a loss, he performed a rescue operation that shocked the entire internet.
